thread.section_title: CarRental8 Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CarRental8 | carrental8.com | 7 of 86
thread.title: Jeff

author: Jeff
title: Jeff
text: After having checked all the major car rental agencies websites for an inexpensive rate, I did a search on Google and found CarRental8. I put in my criteria for a car needed in Ft Myers, FL and they came back with a rate that was 100.00 cheaper than anything I had found, on any of the other sites. Within an hour I had a confirmation that they had brokered a deal with Alamo for my car. Printed out all the necessary paperwork and when I arrived at the airport, went to the Alamo desk and gave them what I had, and I got my car. I will definitely use them all the time.
